content.p: The animation 'Consider Eating Disorders in Men', co-designed by Heike Bartel with men with lived experience of eating disorders, is featured in the recent UKRI blog on 'How the arts and humanities will shape the future of healthcare' as an example of 'Designing Solutions' through the arts & humanities. The free online training tool centred around the animation has been updated by Heike Bartel & team and received renewed accreditation by the Royal College of GPs and endorsement from the Royal College of Nursing. The animation is part of Heike's project Hungry for Words - a project seeking creative approaces to address eating disorders in men.
